programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: Romantic wartime thriller starring Brad Pitt and Marion Cotillard. Intelligence officer Max Vatan and Resistance agent Marianne Beauséjour fall in love and get married after working together on a dangerous mission to assassinate Nazi officers. programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Second World War drama starring Asa Butterfield, Jack Scanlon and David Thewlis. programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: Period action romance starring Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh and Zhang Ziyi. programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honour Among Thieves
programme.desc: Following the death of his wife, lute-playing bard Edgin abandons a noble pledge and turns to petty thievery with his surrogate sister, exiled barbarian Holga. The duo recruit self-doubting sorcerer Simon and incorrigible rogue Forge to their merry gang. A plan to steal the fabled Scroll of Reawakening backfires and Edgin is incarcerated with Holga on charges of grand larceny and skulduggery. programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, History, War, Documentary And Factual ║ 2001 ║ 15
programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. On 3 October 1993, elite US troops were sent into Somalia's capital, Mogadishu, to capture two lieutenants working for the local warlord responsible for orchestrating a famine in the region. programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Comedy starring Gene Wilder and Richard Pryor. A bookie is shot and fatally wounded by a mysterious woman while visiting the news-stand of deaf former actor Dave Lyons and his blind assistant Wally. Before dying, the bookie secretes what appears to be a rare coin in the stand's cash box. Dave and Wally are subsequently arrested for murder and embark on a chaotic quest to prove their innocence Arthur Hiller - Director Gene Wilder - Dave Lyons Richard Pryor - Wally Karew Joan Severance - Eve Kevin Spacey - Kirgo Alan North - Captain Braddock Anthony Zerbe - Sutherland Louis Giambalvo - Gatlin Kirsten Childs - Adele Hardy Rawls - Tourist Audrie Neenan - Policewoman / Marilyn Lauren Tom - Mitzie Gene Wilder - Dave Lyons Richard Pryor - Wally Karew Joan Severance - Eve Kevin Spacey - Kirgo Alan North - Captain Braddock Anthony Zerbe - Sutherland Louis Giambalvo - Gatlin Kirsten Childs - Adele Hardy Rawls - Tourist Audrie Neenan - Policewoman / Marilyn Lauren Tom - Mitzie.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: Wartime comedy starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey. programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: A man named Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that every few minutes he is jumping forward to the next year of his life. Trapped in a cycle of time jumps, Teddy is faced with a race against time as his life crumbles around him. With the help of his best friend Sam, Teddy tries to piece together where it all went wrong and, as his life flashes before his eyes, he must learn how to live life in the precious moments to win back the woman he loves. programme.title: The Last Rifleman

programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: Sci-fi crime thriller starring Andrea Mohylova and Matej Hadek. In the year 2041, human lives can be backed up and rebooted from a server. When dogged cop Em Trochinowska is assigned to the case of murdered megacorp research head David Kurlstat, his lack of a "restore point" stirs her suspicions. As Europol agents try to obstruct Em's investigation, she begins to uncover a conspiracy Robert Hloz - Director Andrea Mohylova - Em Trochinowska Matej Hadek - Kurlstat, David Vaclav Neuzil - Agent Mansfeld Milan Ondrik - Viktor Toffer Karel Dobry - Rohan Andrea Mohylova - Em Trochinowska Matej Hadek - Kurlstat, David Vaclav Neuzil - Agent Mansfeld Milan Ondrik - Viktor Toffer Karel Dobry - Rohan.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: The disappearance of an eight-year-old girl ties together a series of past deaths and disappearances, as well as bringing the truth about a broken family's history into the light. programme.title: Lee

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: In AD 33 Jerusalem, non-believer Clarence hatches a scheme to pose as a messiah as he approaches the 30-day deadline imposed by sadistic loan shark Jedediah the Terrible. News spreads of Clarence's powers of healing, which may spare him Jedediah's blade, but condemn him to crucifixion at the hands of a preening Pontius Pilate. programme.title: Lisa Frankenstein
programme.desc: Romantic comedy horror starring Kathryn Newton and Cole Sprouse. As a child, Lisa Swallows was traumatised when she witnessed the murder of her mother. Now a teenage outsider, she fantasises about a Victorian gentleman whose grave she tends. programme.title: Freud's Last Session
programme.desc: Period drama starring Anthony Hopkins and Matthew Goode. As war breaks out in Europe in September 1939, ailing psychoanalyst Sigmund Freud welcomes author CS Lewis to his London home. programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Andy Cole
programme.desc: The United Legend looks back on his incredible Premier League career from start to finish. Coley also opens up about his battle with illness in recent years, in an emotional episode of the UTD Podcast.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Rooney
programme.desc: United and England's record goalscorer looks back on his incredible years at Old Trafford; the trophies, the training sessions, the dressing room pranks - this episode has it all!

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Rashford
programme.desc: The United and England forward looks back on an incredible year both on and off the pitch. We hear everything from the nerve-wracking penalty in Paris to forcing two UK government U-turns.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Ruud van Nistelrooy
programme.desc: The goalscoring machine looks back on his career; how a move to Old Trafford nearly fell apart, his rivalry with Arsenal, and training with Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Javier Hernandez
programme.desc: Chicharito looks back on the emotional moment he was told he'd be heading to Old Trafford, and all the iconic moments that followed.

programme.title: Official UTD Podcast - Tom Heaton
programme.desc: The ex-United Academy goalkeeper is back at the club and we caught up with him in the days following his return.

programme.title: Official UTD Podcast - Sir Alex
programme.desc: This is the one. Your 60 minutes with The Boss. We covered everything from Cristiano Ronaldo's dramatic Old Trafford return, to signing Eric Cantona on a lunch break.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Ji-Sung Park
programme.desc: Ji reflected fondly on his special years at United and his close relationship with the fans, but he requested them to stop singing his chant, which has offensive connotations to the people of Korea.

programme.title: The Official UTD Podcast - Jones
programme.desc: Phil gave us an update on his fitness and how mentally difficult it has been watching from the sidelines. He reflected on his career so far, including the highs of winning the Premier League.

programme.title: Official UTD Podcast - Tim Howard
programme.desc: Tim opened up about his challenges growing up with Tourette's Syndrome, and how playing soccer was a way to free himself from the hurdles the diagnosis put in his way.

programme.title: Official UTD Podcast - John O'Shea
programme.desc: Sheasy told us about the tough lesson he learned at the hands of Roy Keane, and why he thinks Sir Alex trusted him to play in every position at the club.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Nani
programme.desc: Former United winger Nani joins the Pod via video chat all the way from Orlando, where they look back on some of the iconic and strange moments in his time at Old Trafford.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Evra
programme.desc: Uncle Pat joins the Pod in a feature-length episode where he tells the emotional story of his route into football - right the way through to retirement, with lots of tears and laughter along the way.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Fortune
programme.desc: The happiest man in football talks to the Pod about his tough upbringing in South Africa and the incredible journey to Old Trafford.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Yorke
programme.desc: United Legend Dwight Yorke joins us from his home in Dubai to look back on his incredible career, and how an early childhood car accident may have influenced his outlook on life.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Robin van Persie
programme.desc: RVP talks to the Pod about facing United with Arsenal in that famous 8-2 victory, his joy at finally winning the Premier League, and what it was like to work with Louis van Gaal.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast: Berbatov
programme.desc: Sam Homewood, David May and Helen Evans travel to London to meet up with Cult United hero Dimitar Berbatov.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast: Fletcher
programme.desc: Helen and Sam caught up with former Manchester United and Scotland midfielder Darren Fletcher. Fletch gives the podcast team a fascinating insight into his career and his current and future plans.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Scholes
programme.desc: The United Legend talks to the Pod about the heartbreak of missing out on the Champions League Final, his retirement U-turn and those 'mistimed' tackles.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Cantona
programme.desc: The King talks to the Pod about his famous "seagulls following the trawler" press conference, his unique celebration against Sunderland and the meaning of life.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Saha
programme.desc: The Frenchman opens up about his struggles with injury, Sir Alex reducing him to tears and how he forced through his transfer from Fulham.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Schmeichel
programme.desc: The Great Dane talks to Helen, Maysie and Alex Bruce about his explosive bust-up with Sir Alex, the historic Treble in 1999, and how he regrets leaving the club.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Whiteside
programme.desc: The Pod team set up in Norman's local where he recalls tales with Bryan Robson & Paul McGrath, and takes the guys back to his incredible rise to fame at the age of 17.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Nani
programme.desc: Former United winger Nani joins the Pod via video chat all the way from Orlando, where they look back on some of the iconic and strange moments in his time at Old Trafford.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Fortune
programme.desc: The happiest man in football talks to the Pod about his tough upbringing in South Africa and the incredible journey to Old Trafford.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Yorke
programme.desc: United Legend Dwight Yorke joins us from his home in Dubai to look back on his incredible career, and how an early childhood car accident may have influenced his outlook on life.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Robin van Persie
programme.desc: RVP talks to the Pod about facing United with Arsenal in that famous 8-2 victory, his joy at finally winning the Premier League, and what it was like to work with Louis van Gaal.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast: Phil Neville
programme.desc: The former United defender looks back on his Premier League career including a flashpoint with Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Andy Cole
programme.desc: The United Legend looks back on his incredible Premier League career from start to finish. Coley also opens up about his battle with illness in recent years, in an emotional episode of the UTD Podcast.

programme.title: The Official Utd Podcast - Rooney
programme.desc: United and England's record goalscorer looks back on his incredible years at Old Trafford; the trophies, the training sessions, the dressing room pranks - this episode has it all!

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Rashford
programme.desc: The United and England forward looks back on an incredible year both on and off the pitch. We hear everything from the nerve-wracking penalty in Paris to forcing two UK government U-turns.

programme.title: Utd Podcast - Odion Ighalo
programme.desc: The Nigerian striker shares his incredible journey to Old Trafford. Odion also revealed how he used to save up his dinner money to pay to watch United play at weekends.

programme.desc: Leah reveals how Casey Stoney convinced her to forget her Leeds allegiances and join her project at Manchester United.
